Agile Roundabout Nov

November 20, 2024 @ 8:00 am - 5:00 pm

  • « Data Roundabout November

Agile Roundabout

Dive deep into the world of rapid iteration and flexible response. Meet experts who shape the agile landscape and learn from the best practices they implement in top tech companies. Agile is more than a methodology; it’s a mindset. Come and harness its power at ‘The Roundabouts’ event.
